CustomField.description: Is Account a Shareholder with any Brookfield business unit?
CustomField.formula: BAM_Units_Shares__c > 0 || BBU_Units_Shares__c > 0 || BEP_Units_Shares__c > 0 || BIP_Units_Shares__c > 0 || BOX_Units_Shares__c > 0 || BPO_Units_Shares__c > 0 || BPY_Units_Shares__c > 0
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is Account a Shareholder with any Brookfield business unit?
CustomField.label: Brookfield Shareholder
